story_parts.text:
Lion had always been interested in the inner workings of government. As a child, he would spend hours reading about the different departments and how they functioned. He knew he wanted to work in government someday, but he never imagined he would be a spy.

Lion was approached by a government official one day and asked if he would be interested in working as a spy. Lion didn't hesitate to say yes. He was given a set of instructions and told to report back to

next_options.0: Lion is given a set of instructions and told to report back to the official in one week
next_options.1: Lion is given a set of instructions and told to report back to the official immediately

next_options.0: The moral of the story is that it's never too late to learn
next_options.1: The moral of the story is that wisdom comes with age

quiz_parts.question: What is the main idea of the paragraph?

options.0: The author is annoyed with people who do not use proper grammar
options.1: The author believes that everyone should learn proper grammar
options.2: The author thinks that proper grammar is important in some situations
options.3: The author does not think that proper grammar is important
